How to create your website with AI (in 60 seconds):

1. Go to Gamma. Free to try.
2. Click on "Create new with AI".
3. Select "Generate" â†’ and "Webpage".
4. Describe your website + how many cards.
5. Click "Generate outline" & change it if needed.
6. Pick one of Gamma's theme, or make your own.
7. Gamma will generate a full website you can edit.

60 seconds. An entire website. Easily editable.
